about_the_game:
Oh deer, Christmas is here! Christmas inspired buses are coming to Angel Shores and Seaside Valley to celebrate the most festive of seasons. Customize your bus and make it your own with this Christmas themed skin pack.

This exclusive Christmas Skin Pack includes the following skins:

  • Reindeer Slide
  • Beach Christmas
  • Skiing Season
  • Hot Cocoa
  • Snowball Fight
  • Christmas Carols
  • Christmas Trees
  • Feeling Cozy
  • Christmas Gifts
  • Christmas Town

All paint jobs are fully compatible with all buses, including articulated, double-decker, and e-buses. Give your passengers the merriest journey of the season in your personalized bus with these tailored Christmas themed designs.
detailed_description:
Oh deer, Christmas is here! Christmas inspired buses are coming to Angel Shores and Seaside Valley to celebrate the most festive of seasons. Customize your bus and make it your own with this Christmas themed skin pack.

This exclusive Christmas Skin Pack includes the following skins:

  • Reindeer Slide
  • Beach Christmas
  • Skiing Season
  • Hot Cocoa
  • Snowball Fight
  • Christmas Carols
  • Christmas Trees
  • Feeling Cozy
  • Christmas Gifts
  • Christmas Town

All paint jobs are fully compatible with all buses, including articulated, double-decker, and e-buses. Give your passengers the merriest journey of the season in your personalized bus with these tailored Christmas themed designs.

name: Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Christmas Skin Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140z or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Oh deer, Christmas is here! Christmas inspired buses are coming to Angel Shores and Seaside Valley to celebrate the most festive of seasons. Customize your bus and make it your own with this Christmas themed skin pack.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
